commit message: pathChanged: clean up initial bounds check

Add some menu items to the ActionBar

Fix a couple of menu issues

Fix NPE when updating status icon

The ImageView was initially removed from the parent to hide it, but then when
we try to get a reference to it again to change the drawable, it's NULL.

Instead of removing the view, hide it using View.GONE which has the desired
effect (no space taken on the layout).
